summary: This ENB brings performance and realism together i highly recomend it!
descriptionHtml:
[center][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7][COLOR=#0070c0]Optimization ENB[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[line]
[font=book antique][size=5][color=white]This mod makes your game look great,not by only making it more realistic but the performance is great not only for low-end pc's it can be easily handeld by any pc.The mod only decreases 4 frames per second or less,and it's compatible with all the mods that i know.
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/7446496-1391911691.jpg[/img]
Average framerate for me is:
85fps in Whiterun
105 in Wilderness[/font]
[line]
The ENB ad's several effects like:
-Slightly Bokeh DOF
-sunglare
-glare(when fire and sparks are available)
[/font][/color][/size][/center]
[line]
Have fun!and never forget to endorse it helps me a lot!
If you want to ask me something here's my Youtube,Facebook and Google+ pages.
[line]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=7][COLOR=#0070c0][URL=http://www.youtube.com/user/FE4RKING]Youtube/FE4RKING[/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[line]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=7][COLOR=#0070c0][U][URL=https://www.facebook.com/pages/Fe4rking/427649187362491?ref=hl]Facebook/FE4RKING[/URL][/U][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[line]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=7][COLOR=#0070c0][U][URL=https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/113948814144676653282/113948814144676653282/posts?pageid=113948814144676653282]G+/FE4RKING[/URL][/U][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[line]
* CREDITS *
Boris Vorontsov who made the ENB - www.enbdev.com
[line]
* INSTALL *
Just place the files into the Skyrim folder(not DATA)where the Skyrim.exe is located!
Here's the d3d9.dll file:http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0102.htm
[line]
[center][font=impact][size=5][color=white]Have fun![/center][/font][/size][/color]
author: FE4RKING
